TypeSignature.Value: public delegate void NormalizerStaticExtensions.OnFitCumulativeDistribution<TData>(TData mean, TData standardDeviation);
.class nested public auto ansi sealed NormalizerStaticExtensions/OnFitCumulativeDistribution`1<TData> extends System.MulticastDelegate
Public Delegate Sub NormalizerStaticExtensions.OnFitCumulativeDistribution(Of TData)(mean As TData, standardDeviation As TData)

Docs.typeparam: The data type being received, either a numeric type, or a sequence of the numeric type
Docs.param: The mean value. In the scalar case, this is a single value. In the vector case this is of length equal to the number of slots.
The standard deviation. In the scalar case, this is a single value. In the vector case this is of length equal to the number of slots.
Docs.summary: For user provided delegates to receive information when a cumulative distribution function normalizer is fitted.
